name: Crazy Copter v1
description:
Crazy Copter is an Atari style little arcade game where you fly your helicopter and shoot down enemy copters, planes and anti-air vehicles. 

=HOW TO PLAY=

W,A,S,D - Move around

Mouse - Aim and Shoot

Power up - Increase fire rate of your helicopter

HQ - Refuel your helicopter if fuel is running low

This game is very small and simple, I may add more features to this game in the feature. For now I am currently working on another copter game that has more than what this one offer.
